A few days ago I was having a rare soda craving and I didn't know that they discontinued Vault. I went to go buy one and was actually was surprised when 7-11 didn't have any. Shows how up to date I am on the soda game.

Oh man, kinda late and I'm typing this on a cell phone but I have to tell this story.
Freshman year of high school a friend of mine had a very large iguana. Had to be nearing 10 years old. They took it outside in the front yard to play around with it and ended up tossing the iguana to each other back and forth. They soon started widening the distance between them as they are throwing this iguana to each other. Pretty soon it turned into a competition of who could throw the iguana in the air the highest. After this, I'm assuming the iguana is dead by now, they begin tossing it in front if cars driving by in hopes that one runs the iguana over. After several tries they end up getting the iguana right under a passing car's tires and couldn't stop telling me about the image of the iguana's eyeballs exploding out of it's head. Truly fucked up story. Some real sociopathic shit.

WRITING.TEXT: My grandfather was a Nazi soldier in WWII. He was educated and was unwillingly taken as an officer and had no choice. Every time I would talk to him get in depth about his experiences he would end up crying so hard that he couldn't even speak. I still don't even know fully what he did to this day and now that he just died I don't think I ever will.
